title: The "Insane" Message Every News Station Should Broadcast
text:
By Christopher Watson
Friday, January 19, 2018 22:02
 
All platitudes and euphemisms aside, when people say that they want a democratic government or a government called a republic or a monarchy or a limited government, they are saying that they want a ruler with a ruling class calling the shots for the rest of us.  To want a government means to desire to have groups of individuals with the right to rule everybody else.  They have the right to rule, you have the OBLIGATION to obey.  A scenario absent of the idea that someone has the right to do something that no one else has the right to do and absent of a subjected class who has the obligation to obey what the rulers write on fancy pieces of paper through the magical incantation of what is known as the legislative process, is an atmosphere that is absent of government.  
Government means the right to rule.
